features: Vertical box baffles in the torso area accommodate extra down and boost warmth around the core, vertical baffles in chest optimize position of down to prevent it moving during use
Lower part of the bag uses a sewn through horizontal baffle construction to minimize weight
½ zip with two sliders aids access and allows ventilation from mid-section of bag
Updated sizing provides extra room for both shoulders and hips while still maintaining insulation efficiency
Draft tube prevents heat loss through the zipper
